p: U87 and U231 cell lines were seeded in 6-well plates at 40,000 cells in triplicates using the standard media as described by Guessous et al. [ 17]. Cells were incubated overnight before treated with the extract at various concentrations depending on the extract but mostly at 3, 10, 30, 50, and 100 μg/ml and then control wells. After 48 h of incubation, the cells were trypsinized, harvested, and counted using haemocytometer.
